message:
I think the package manager (NuGet) is great; the problem is strong-naming. [https://twitter.com/hashtag/nomorestrongnaming](https://twitter.com/hashtag/nomorestrongnaming)

I'll update AsyncDiagnostics to work with the newest PostSharp, and try to set the dependency to a specific version. In the meantime, you can use assembly redirection in your app.config to make it work.
